title: Implement Data Structures for Lead Scoring
summary: Design and implement data structures to store engagement history, demographic data, and predictive scores for leads.

review_states.comment: The data structures for engagement history look solid and should be efficient for retrieval. The predictive scores approach seems scalable, and the calculations are clear. LGTM, approved! üöÄ

The demographic data structure is flexible and should support various lead attributes well. I ran the unit tests, and everything passed smoothly, ensuring data integrity and correctness. Same here, LGTM! Approved! üéâ

title: Set Up Kafka Infrastructure for Real-Time Data Streaming
summary: This PR sets up the necessary Kafka infrastructure to enable real-time data streaming for the AIX lead qualification system. It includes the configuration of Kafka brokers, topics, and partitions to ensure scalability and reliability.

review_states.comment: The Kafka brokers are configured correctly and running in the dev environment. Nice work on that! Based on our current traffic, I'd suggest starting with at least 3 partitions per topic to allow for growth.

The broker setup looks solid. However, the topics for lead engagement events need more partitions for scalability. Also, please add step-by-step instructions for setting up Kafka locally in the documentation.

title: Integrate Diverse Datasets for Model Retraining
summary: This PR integrates new and diverse datasets into the existing data pipeline to enhance the AI model's training process. The goal is to improve model performance and reduce bias by ensuring a wide variety of data inputs.

review_states.comment: The new datasets are integrated smoothly into the pipeline. The preprocessing scripts look solid and handle the new data formats well. Everything seems to be in order. LGTM, approved! ‚úÖ
The unit tests added are comprehensive and ensure the integrity of the datasets. The documentation updates are clear and detailed. LGTM! Approved! üéâ

title: Implement Salesforce API Integration
summary: This PR introduces the integration with Salesforce API to enable data flow between AIX and Salesforce. It includes setting up authentication, defining endpoints, and handling data requests and responses.

review_states.comment: The authentication setup and endpoints are well-defined and documented. However, the data retrieval endpoint could benefit from more specific error messages. Please address this.
The unit tests are mostly great and passing, but a few edge cases around failed authentication scenarios are missing. Please add those.

title: Implement Data Encryption and Access Controls
summary: Add encryption mechanisms for sensitive data and implement access control policies to ensure data security.

The access controls are correctly implemented with clear role-based restrictions. Integration tests ran successfully with no issues. Same here, LGTM! Approved! üéâ

title: Implement Automated Model Retraining Pipeline

The integration of the automated pipeline is seamless. However, the logging and alerting setup needs more detail to effectively monitor the retraining process. Please enhance the logging and alerting features.
